properties.areaDesc: Leelanau; Beaver Island and surrounding islands
properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 3:10PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Leelanau and Beaver Island and surrounding islands
Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northerly winds develop tonight and
turn more northeast and further increase Saturday afternoon and
Saturday night.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
